title: These Chic Leather Riding Boots Are Essential to Your Fall Wardrobe
description: Horse girl, but make it high fashion.
excerpt: We found the best leather riding boots for this season. Shop the most stylish pairs in our edit, now.

html:
The Viral One

Frye Campus 14L

Rumor has it that these Frye boots have been circulating TikTok and becoming the new It-girl boot for the season. Secure your pair before they’re gone.

Size: 5.5-13

Colors: Banana, Brown, Saddle, Black, Dark Brown

Materials: Scrunch Leather

Equestrian Classic

Ralph Lauren Calfskin Tall Riding Boot

Everyone needs a pair of riding boots from the All-American brand Ralph Lauren. These are on my personal wishlist.

Size: 5-11

Colors: Cuoio, Black

Materials: Calfskin

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Rustic Flair

Marion Parke Elizabeth Tall Boot

Without a doubt, you need the right pair of boots to get you through your autumnal festivities. Style these with your best barrel jeans and favorite sweater. Sure, you might not win the best pumpkin carving award, but you will win best dressed.

Sizes: 35-42

Colors: Brown, Black

Materials: Pebbled Calf Leather

Wicked Green

Gucci Slim Horsebit Boot

Embrace a flirty twist on the classic silhouette with this shiny pair from Gucci. The horse-bit charm and olive hue will make you feel enticingly wicked.

Sizes: 6-11

Colors: Dark Shiny Green, Bordeaux Shiny Leather

Materials: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Timeless

The Row Nobilis Riding Boot

The sleek and classic design of these black leather boots makes for a perfect go-to boot year-round. For fall dressing, pair with trousers and a trench or a midi skirt and a striped button-down top.

Sizes: 35-42

Colors: Black, Dark Brown

Materials: Leather

Chic Fusion

Coach Daria Moto Boot

Keeping up with ELLE’s trend report on boots, you will see that both the moto and equestrian styles are here to stay. Luckily for you, this pair of riding boots from Coach allows for a chic combo. The height and shape of the boot give an equestrian-inspired feel, but the silver embellishments will add a touch of edge. I love a boot with versatility, don’t you?

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Black

Materials: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Color of the Season

Larroude Anne Boot

Oxblood is bound to become a must-have color for fall, so grab this stylish pair of riding boots to add the seasonal pop of color to your wardrobe before it’s too late.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Burgundy, Black, Toasted

Materials: Lancaster leather

Wild and Western

Tony Bianco Apache

A heeled boot is great for practically any occasion–whether it’s work, brunch, or a night out. Elevate your wardrobe with this beautiful pair of rich caramel-colored boots.

Sizes: 5-10

Colors: Toffee Como, Black Como

Material: Leather, rubber

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Comfy and Cozy

Miu Miu Fumé leather boots

Frigid weather has nothing on these shearling-lined boots from Miu Miu.

Sizes: 34-42

Colors: Sienna

Materials: Leather, shearling

Farmerette Energy

Free People Blaze Pull-On Boots

Can someone invite me to their farm? I would love nothing more than to live the idyllic lifestyle and feed the animals in these cute boots.

Sizes: 6-11

Colors: Parchment Leather, Vintage Tan, Victorian Black, Beige Snake

Materials: 100% Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Sleek and Simple

Everlane The Riding Boot

Everlane offers a sleek riding boot with a soft square toe. Perfect for making a chic statement during all your seasonal adventures.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Black, Rum

Materials: Leather

Sleek Leather

Paige Raina Boot

Paige boots are a classic staple, no matter the season. You simply cannot go wrong with these—especially with that subtle Western detail.

Sizes: 5-11

Color: Black

Materials: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
